Text: Defense wins championships Can youto the NFL playoff party werent mailed out until the final game but now teams are focused on winning a championship Who could have predicted the surprising run to the playoffs by New England Pittsburgh and Chicago If youre saying I could have then consider this your invitation to Fantasy Football Playoff Challenge bkbsbjbubt It has been said that defense wins championships and looking at the teams that had the best defensive numbers right the stats dont lie So now its up to you Do you go with history and select players from a stingy coldweather team such as Chicago Pittsburgh or Green Bay Or noting that St Louis is on carpet the rest of the way do you think offense with members of the greatest show on turf The choice is up to you when you play ESPNcoms Fantasy Football Playoff Challenge bkbsbjbubt Sign up today bkbsbjbubt bkbsbjbubt bkbsbjbubt stfflpcemailimgxgif Defensive Points Allowed Rank Team PPG Chicago Philadelphia Pittsburgh Green Bay New England St Louis Baltimore Tampa Bay San Francisco Jacksonville Miami New York Made Playoffs This message was sent to You are receiving this mail because you have registered with ESPNcom If you don not wish to receive information regarding ESPNcom in the future please click here bkbsbjbubt to unsubscribe bkbsbjbu
